summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-18 (authentication fix) is implemented through the LoginButton component with proper error handling, state management, and user feedback. REQ-19 (landing page redesign) is fully implemented with a construction-themed hero section, feature highlights, responsive design, and proper routing logic. All acceptance criteria are met with evidence in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (X/Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn) in the landing page footer
hallucinated_features.reason: Social media integration was not requested in the BuildRequest. The non-goals explicitly state 'Creating marketing content or legal pages' is out of scope, and social media links could be considered marketing infrastructure.

hallucinated_features.description: Six feature cards instead of requested 3-5 (Voice Logging, Smart Scheduling, Safety Tracking, Real-Time Cost Tracking, Weather-Aware Scheduling, Permit Tracking)
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-19 acceptance criteria specifies 'Feature highlights section showcasing 3-5 core capabilities' but the implementation includes 6 feature cards based on the truncated diff showing at least Voice Logging, Smart Scheduling, Safety Tracking, and references to additional features.
